abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that extraordinary pitching carried the Philadelphia Phillies throughout the regular season, but an offensive outburst won them Game 1 of the National League division series against the St Louis Cardinals.
snippet: Extraordinary pitching carried the Phillies throughout the season, but an offensive outburst won them Game 1 against the Cardinals.
lead_paragraph: Extraordinary pitching carried the Phillies throughout the season, but an offensive outburst won them Game 1 against the Cardinals.

headline.main: The Phillies Change Their Script, and the Reviews Are Quite Good
headline.print_headline: The Phillies Change Their Script, And the Reviews Are Quite Good
headline.seo: Phillies Change Script and Win Convincingly
